column2: As you plummit into what seems the eternitites below the surface"," you can only help but wonder when you will hit your accelerating demise. In your final musings you dan't noticed that you’ve landed"," softly"," on some strange otherworldly surface. The only thing in sight is the dark walls around you and

You traversed the world below the surface"," and have left chaos in your step. Slain all manner of monstrosities and abberration in your way. Some claimed to be human"," or at least"," human shaped. Some only hunted for food and playthings. Some had no face and form and hunted you through the dark. You have prevailed nonetheless"," and arrived at what you sought","
